sisyphus.prompt_append: Output in Chinese as default, unless instructed otherwise.
sisyphus.comment: The default orchestrator. Plans, delegates, and executes complex tasks using specialized subagents with aggressive parallel execution. Todo-driven workflow with extended thinking (32k budget).

oracle.comment: Architecture decisions, code review, debugging. Read-only consultation - stellar logical reasoning and deep analysis. Inspired by AmpCode.

librarian.comment: Multi-repo analysis, documentation lookup, OSS implementation examples. Deep codebase understanding with evidence-based answers. Inspired by AmpCode.

explore.comment: Fast codebase exploration and contextual grep. Uses Gemini 3 Flash when Antigravity auth is configured, Haiku when Claude max20 is available, otherwise Grok. Inspired by Claude Code.

multimodal-looker.comment: Visual content specialist. Analyzes PDFs, images, diagrams to extract information. Saves tokens by having another agent process media.

prometheus.comment: Strategic planner with interview mode. Creates detailed work plans through iterative questioning.

metis.comment: Plan consultant - pre-planning analysis. Identifies hidden intentions, ambiguities, and AI failure points.

momus.comment: Plan reviewer - validates plans against clarity, verifiability, and completeness standards.

ultrabrain.comment: Deep logical reasoning, complex architecture decisions requiring extensive analysis

quick.comment: Trivial tasks - single file changes, typo fixes, simple modifications

unspecified-low.comment: Tasks that don't fit other categories, low effort required

unspecified-high.comment: Tasks that don't fit other categories, high effort required
